title: Schedule an Interview with a Hostile Source
description: A reporter needs to interview a public figure who is known to be hostile to the press.

tasks.description: Find the contact information for the person's official press secretary or communications director.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the correct contact info for the gatekeeper.

tasks.description: Draft a very professional and carefully worded interview request that clearly states the topic of discussion and why the person's perspective is important.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a persuasive and non-confrontational request.

tasks.description: Persistently but politely follow up on the request if no response is received.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows up via email and phone until a 'yes' or 'no' is received.
